name: 郭宏源
objective: 最佳化組合邏輯與循序邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，StateMachine 設計與測試技巧，HDL 語法介紹與實務設計。
schedule:
1. Review of Logic Design Fundamentals
2. Combinational Logic
3. CMOS Digital Logic Circuits
4. Mealy/Moore Sequential Circuit Design
5. Equivalent States and Reduction of State Tables
6. Sequential Circuit Timing
7. Programmable Logic Devices(PLD)
8. Field-Programmable Gate Arrays (FPGAs)
9. Midterm Exam.
10. Hardware Description Languages
11. VHDL & Verilog Modules
12. Digital Circuit Example
13. Serial Communication
14. Arithmetic Logic Unit Design
15. Floating-Point Arithmetic
16. RISC Microprocessor
17. MIPS Instruction Encoding
18. Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
平時: 30%
期中考: 35%
期末考: 35%
materials:
1. "Digital Systems Design Using Verilog", Charles H. Roth ,ISBN：9781305120747, Cengage
2. "Digital Systems: Principles and Applications", Tocci, 2011/11, ISBN-13：9780130387936, Pearson Education
3. "Fundamentals of Digital Logic with Verilog Design", Stephen Brown, 2009/3, ISBN：1259072037, Mc Graw Hill
consultation: 研究室：綜科館 209-3 室 E-mail : hungyuankuo@mail.ntut.edu.tw
